author: Staff Reporter
text:
Excerpts of what Kanhaiya Kumar said during the video recording by team of Supreme Court lawyers:

“The police got me here. First of all I was brought from the gate this way. I don’t know the gate number. The media people surrounded me near the gate. No sooner did the police escort me out of the media, and inside the gate, a mob, dressed in advocate attire attacked me. As a result I fell down.

“It seemed as if they were waiting with full preparation to attack since from amongst the people who were beating me, some were calling out others by shouting, aa gaya, aa gaya .

“I was pushed inside it (X-ray machine) in such a manner that my pants came down. My leg was injured and I was kicked and punched in my abdomen. As soon as I managed to rescue myself from the clutches of one person, another person would start beating me up. The policemen with me also got beaten up. A policeman has been attacked with a blade. “After that I managed to get inside the gate. Thereafter one of them chased me and managed to get inside the adjoining room and went and sat behind. I told my teacher that his man was beating me. The police enquires about the identity of that person. However, he replies who are they and asks for their I-card. He managed his exit right in front of them [police]. He could have been nabbed right there.

“I don't know they are lawyers or not but what they are saying, I think they are highly politically motivated persons. By portraying me as a traitor, media is conducting my trial, not the entire media though... I have full faith in my Indian constitution.

“I told the Judge that Sir, please note that I am terrorised and I am in a state of fear.”
title: Mob in lawyers’ robes attacked me: Kanhaiya
